message.subject: BNP PARIBAS Commodity Futures EIA Survey......RESULTS!!
message.content:
M1.1. Here are this week's survey results.
[Inform: the following is this week's survey results]
M1.2. AVG +62
M1.3. AVG w/o High & Low +62
M1.4. Median +59
M1.5. Standard Deviation 10
M1.6. # of responses 52
M1.7. High +86
M1.8. Low +46
M1.9. AGA Last Year +99
[Inform: this week's survey results]
M1.10. Thank You!
[Conventional: thanks]
M1.11. Anthony Carroll
M1.12. BNP PARIBAS
[Conventional: signature]
